text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- ETA kills a supreme court judge in Madrid and an army employee in Granada
- An HB leader commits suicide just hours before an appearance at the supreme court
- ETA kills a high court judge in Madrid and an army employee in Granada
- La Kutxa buys 1.5 percent of Repsol for 20 bln ptas
- Telefonica sets maximum share price at 3,385 pesetas
- Revival in business and consumer confidence in Spain and Europe
